en: You can't buy these from a shop.
zh: 你不能从商店里买到这些。

en: Ring me back.
Phone me back.
I go red just thinking about it.
zh: 我一想到这件事就脸红。

en: I want a chewy sweet.
zh: 我想要一个有嚼劲的糖果。

en: Mr White's garden is large.
I like to try everything, so I decided to join immediately.
zh: 我喜欢尝试一切，所以我决定立即加入。

en: Next year is a leap year.
You look like your mother when she was young.
zh: 你看起来像你年轻时的母亲。

en: You look like your mother did when she was young.
zh: 你看起来像你年轻时的母亲。

en: Tom didn't want to stay at home alone.
zh: 汤姆不想独自待在家里。

en: The caller hung up without saying anything.
zh: 来电者什么也没说就挂断了。

en: I've noticed that just like Tails, I have self-esteem problems, partly because of my childhood, when my classmates treated me badly for being different, but I keep fighting anyways to be better. Plus, he likes helping and is sweet and friendly, same as I want to be. Maybe that's why I've always liked him so much and identify so much with him.
zh: 我注意到，就像塔尔斯一样，我也有自尊问题，部分原因是我的童年，当时我的同学因为我与众不同而对我不好，但我仍然不断努力变得更好。 此外，他喜欢帮助别人，而且很友善，这正是我想要成为的样子。 也许这就是为什么我一直这么喜欢他，并且对他有如此强烈的认同感。

en: I liked him from the start.
I avoid drinking coffee in the evening.
Excuse me. Is anyone home?
Is this how I'm going to die?
zh: 这就是我要死的方式吗？

en: Even monkeys fall from trees. But I can't even climb.
zh: 猴子也会从树上掉下来。但我甚至不会爬树。

en: What made you think it was Tom?
zh: 你为什么认为那是汤姆？

en: I'm tired but I can't sleep.
My grandma is 93 years old. She first known about Facebook about two years back, and about a year ago she got her first smartphone.
zh: 我奶奶93岁了。她大约两年前才知道Facebook，大约一年前她有了她的第一部智能手机。

en: As I approached the door, it opened.
The company makes vegan ground beef that tastes just like the real thing.
zh: 这家公司生产的纯素牛肉碎味道和真的一模一样。

en: Where's my kid?
Where's our kid?
Tom is only interested in football.
Tom is interested only in football.
Laser is currently operating! Use extreme caution!
zh: 激光正在运行！请务必小心！

en: Where's the box of tissues?
The movie was very interesting and kept me hooked till the end.
zh: 这部电影非常有趣，让我一直着迷到最后。

en: You lose your lip balm again?
Did you lose your lip balm again?
zh: 你是不是又丢了润唇膏？

en: What triggers regression?
You've forgotten the question mark.
I will not take the Corona vaccine.
It must have been at least ten times.
You're not Spaniards.
I started, but I didn't finish.
zh: 我开始了，但是没有完成。

en: Let's meet on Saturday!
I started but didn't finish.
zh: 我开始了，但是没有完成。

en: Which cup should I use?
Which glass should I use?
Let me know when you leave work so I can warm up dinner.
zh: 你下班的时候告诉我一声，我好热一下晚饭。

en: I watched Ghost in the Shell today.
zh: 我今天看了《攻壳机动队》。

en: Can I smoke?
Can I smoke a cigarette?
Coming!
What a bastard!
We're also going to buy a bottle of red wine.
They should be here.
You should be here.
She should be here.
The newspaper is delivered to my doorstep every morning by the local delivery boy.
zh: 每天早上，当地的送报员都会把报纸送到我家门口。

en: Why do you want to learn Dutch?
No one could have known.
She is always late.
He is always late.
Oh, that's a shame!
Your girlfriend is older than me.
Tell me a good story.
It's in the past.
To be honest, I love myself.
Did you practice your piano this morning?
zh: 你今天早上练钢琴了吗？

en: The meat is cheap.
We're done!
Do you also collect coins?
It is true, it is not a joke.
I don't need to explain anything.
Let's give these chocolates to grandma.
zh: 我们把这些巧克力给奶奶吧。

en: We watch telly all the time.
He beat his wife.
What are you guys doing this weekend?
zh: 你们这个周末打算做什么？

en: We arrived in Rotterdam on Tuesday.
zh: 我们星期二到达鹿特丹。

en: I can barely pay my bills!
Peter is my eldest son.
Maria will win.
These flowers start blooming in spring.
zh: 这些花在春天开始盛开。

en: When do you plan to get back?
Did you all work together?
Why is February shorter than the other months?
zh: 为什么二月比其他月份短？

en: Black beetles are stronger than red beetles.
zh: 黑色甲虫比红色甲虫更强壮。

en: How many days are in a year?
By the time we arrived the concert had ended.
zh: 当我们到达时，音乐会已经结束了。

en: You should know.
Before I knew it, I didn't want to see you again.
zh: 不知不觉中，我不想再见到你了。

en: How much does a night cost?
Your cat is too fat.
I wrote a letter to Anna, but it came back.
zh: 我给安娜写了一封信，但它被退回来了。

en: I wrote a letter to Anna, but it was returned to me.
zh: 我给安娜写了一封信，但它被退回给我了。

en: "Can I ask you a question?" "No."
zh: “我可以问你一个问题吗？”“不行。”

en: Some countries don't recognize same-sex marriages.
zh: 一些国家不承认同性婚姻。

en: She's young and pretty.
My name is Marina.
Does this kind of thing happen a lot?
Wait until he's back.
I am a native speaker of British English.
Enjoy your youth.
I see something, but I don't know what it is.
zh: 我看到了一些东西，但我不知道那是什么。

en: We have a son and a daughter.
zh: 我们有一个儿子和一个女儿。

en: I'm seriously too busy, so I can't come tonight.
zh: 我真的太忙了，今晚来不了。

en: What is the mystery flavour?
What is the secret of the flavour?
zh: 这个味道的秘密是什么？

en: "Are you OK?" "Yes, everything's fine."
I'm looking for a good computer.
I wish I was better at cooking.
zh: 我希望我能更擅长烹饪。

en: The kitchen is not clean.
If you apply online, it might be faster.
zh: 如果你在网上申请，可能会更快。

en: It costs €25 a metre.
It costs 25 euros a metre.
I learned to drive and got a driving licence when I was eighteen.
zh: 我十八岁的时候学会了开车，并拿到了驾照。

en: I've left my credit card at home.
zh: 我把信用卡落在家里了。

en: It's too late for you to apologize now.
zh: 现在你道歉已经太晚了。

en: It may be faster if you apply online.
zh: 如果你在网上申请，可能会更快。

en: Can I see a menu?
I can give you the address if you want.
zh: 如果你想，我可以给你地址。

en: I want to see that picture.
Who invented it?
Our dishes are prepared by the finest cooks.
zh: 我们的菜肴由最好的厨师烹制。

en: These are the weapons used by the ancients.
zh: 这些是古代人使用的武器。

en: Tom has started dating an older woman.
zh: 汤姆开始和一个年长的女人约会。

en: I don't like this guy.
Which is your favorite browser?
zh: 你最喜欢的浏览器是哪个？

en: Do you hear birds?
Wake me up before you go.
Mathematics is difficult.
How many years have you been selling cars?
I said hello to him.
Let go of that knife! You're scaring me!
zh: 放下那把刀！你吓到我了！

en: What's up with that bomb?
What are you doing with that bomb?
zh: 你在用那个炸弹做什么？

en: What's that bomb for?
zh: 那个炸弹是用来做什么的？

en: What are you doing with that gun? Is that real? Put it down, that's dangerous. You're freaking me out a little.
zh: 你在用那把枪做什么？那是真的吗？放下它，那很危险。你有点吓到我了。

en: You're breaking the rules.
By the time I was your age, I was already married.
zh: 在我像你这么大的时候，我已经结婚了。

en: After boiling the pasta, you should drain it in a colander.
zh: 煮完意大利面后，你应该用滤锅沥干它。

en: I always use a cutting board to protect my countertop and make chopping easier.
zh: 我总是使用砧板来保护我的台面，并使切菜更容易。

en: I use a measuring cup when baking.
zh: 我烘焙的时候会用量杯。

en: Mary really needs your help.
zh: 玛丽真的需要你的帮助。

en: I prefer to shower in the morning.
I prefer to have a shower in the morning.
It's ten days until my birthday.
The pay here is a joke.
zh: 这里的工资简直是个笑话。

en: I prefer showering in the morning.
Please don't raise your voice at me.
Tom has hired a car.
Tom has rented a car.
Tom has borrowed a car.
Tom borrowed a car.
How old were you when you began playing the piano?
zh: 你开始弹钢琴的时候多大了？

en: Close all the doors and windows.
In summer, it gets light earlier than in winter.
I have serious problems.
zh: 我遇到了很严重的问题。

en: She fell asleep in a chair.
Apologies for the continuous emails.
zh: 很抱歉一直发邮件打扰您。

en: I was talking about mushrooms.
There's a car outside.
Cats are animals.
I'll treat you to a cup of coffee.
That's tofu.
It's a small room, isn't it?
Want another beer?
Have you already sent Tom a Christmas card?
zh: 你已经给汤姆寄圣诞卡了吗？

en: I have a lot of work to do before the deadline.
zh: 截止日期前我有很多工作要做。

en: There are many different types of flowers in the garden.
zh: 花园里有很多不同种类的花。

en: A lot of students struggle with math in school.
zh: 很多学生在学校都觉得数学很难。

en: There are many books on the shelf that I have yet to read.
zh: 书架上有很多我还没读过的书。

en: There are many beautiful parks and gardens to explore in this city.
zh: 这个城市有很多美丽的公园和花园可以游览。

en: That was a very difficult exam.
zh: 那是一场非常难的考试。

en: This kind of mushroom is poisonous.
The key was under the couch.
Where do you think the safest place is?
zh: 你认为最安全的地方是哪里？

en: Ugh! I lost my phone again.
zh: 哎呀！我又把手机弄丢了。

en: I've lost my phone again.
There are some things that I need to buy at the drugstore.
zh: 我需要去药店买些东西。

en: Did you show that picture to your friend?
zh: 你给你的朋友看了那张照片吗？

en: Did you see the news about the earthquake?
zh: 你看到关于地震的新闻了吗？

en: He said he read this book in a day.
zh: 他说他一天就读完了这本书。

en: I was wrong. Please forgive me.
What will all of you be doing this weekend?
zh: 这个周末你们都打算做什么？

en: I'm looking forward to the graduation ceremony.
Shall we have some tea?
The Giants will play the Dragons tomorrow.
zh: 巨人队明天将和龙队比赛。

en: This chair was cheap, but it's comfortable.
zh: 这把椅子很便宜，但是很舒服。

en: Even though this chair was cheap, it's very comfortable.
zh: 即使这把椅子很便宜，它也很舒服。

en: My room is small, but it's large enough for me.
zh: 我的房间很小，但是对我来说足够大了。

en: What are you plans for tomorrow?
We'll need to run some tests.
Am I going to need surgery?
Please roll up your sleeve.
Your temperature's a little high.
Your temperature's a bit high.
Your temperature's normal.
You're going to need a few stitches.
I bumped my head.
I'm going to give you a shot.
It hurts when I breathe.
My grandson wants to be a doctor.
I hear footsteps.
There was frost on my windshield this morning.
zh: 今天早上我的挡风玻璃上有霜。

en: I last saw him in 1945.
zh: 我最后一次见到他是在1945年。

en: The cause of this illness is stress.
zh: 这种疾病的原因是压力。

en: I want to mop the floor.
I lost one of my shoes.
I can't find one of my shoes.
When was the last time I used my brain? I don't even remember.
zh: 我上次用脑是什么时候？我都不记得了。

en: Look, will-o'-the-wisps!
Please tell me what to do next.
zh: 请告诉我下一步该怎么做。

en: My elbow hurts whenever I do this.
zh: 我每次这样做的时候，我的胳膊肘都会疼。

en: You hurt my wife, and I'll kill you.
zh: 你伤害了我的妻子，我会杀了你。

en: Does your foot still hurt?
My teeth hurt when I drink something cold.
If we aren't careful, someone will get hurt.
zh: 如果我们不小心，会有人受伤的。

en: If we aren't careful, someone's going to get hurt.
zh: 如果我们不小心，会有人受伤的。

en: Do your feet still hurt?
We feel the same.
I don't know if I'll be able to help you.
zh: 我不知道我是否能帮到你。

en: I live very near here.
Tom is a stingy guy.
We eat bread every day.
Tom doesn't realize that Mary lied.
zh: 汤姆没有意识到玛丽撒谎了。

en: How long will it take to get to the stadium?
Housework is also an important job.
zh: 家务也是一项重要的工作。

en: I told her that wasn't a problem.
Tom likes to spend time outdoors.
zh: 汤姆喜欢在户外消磨时间。

en: You're about as stubborn as Tom is.
Thanks for helping me write my resume.
I caught a very big fish today.
zh: 我今天钓到了一条非常大的鱼。

en: I don't want to buy anything that I don't need.
zh: 我不想买任何我不需要的东西。

en: I don't want to buy anything I don't need.
zh: 我不想买任何我不需要的东西。

en: Please be a little more patient. Hopefully, we'll have a solution soon.
zh: 请多一点耐心。 希望我们很快就能找到解决方案。

en: I'm rarely late.
Please give me your real name.
zh: 请告诉我你的真实姓名。

en: These colors don't go together well.
This new design is much better than the old one.
zh: 这个新设计比旧的好多了。

en: The big problem is not that I'm fat now, but that I'm doing everything with the same rhythm, basically with the same speed as when I was 30 kilos lighter. And it puts a lot of stress on my body.
zh: 大问题不是我现在很胖，而是我做所有事情的节奏还和以前一样，基本上和比现在轻30公斤的时候速度一样。 这给我的身体带来了很大的压力。

en: Tom is careless and often makes mistakes.
zh: 汤姆很粗心，经常犯错误。

en: I'd like to become a famous footballer.
zh: 我想成为一名著名的足球运动员。

en: I'd like to be a famous footballer.
zh: 我想成为一名著名的足球运动员。

en: Do you always wear a tie at work?
If it rains, we'll go to the cinema.
zh: 如果下雨，我们就去看电影。

en: Tom liked football.
I'm sorry about what I said. I was out of order.
zh: 我很抱歉我所说的话。 我太失礼了。

en: What's your favourite music?
zh: 你最喜欢的音乐是什么？

en: If you pay me, I'l do it.
zh: 如果你付钱给我，我就做。

en: I might have to go to Australia.
How is your project progressing?
Peel the apples and slice them in half, cutting out the core.
zh: 把苹果削皮，切成两半，挖出果核。

en: The package had a sticker on it that said "Handle with care".
zh: 包裹上有一个标签，上面写着“小心轻放”。

en: All you need to do is to write your name and address here.
zh: 你只需要在这里写上你的姓名和地址。

en: Tom may cry.
Mary took her phone out of her handbag.
zh: 玛丽从她的手提包里拿出了手机。

en: If there's anything I can do for you, tell me.
zh: 如果有什么我能为你做的，告诉我。

en: If there's anything I can do for you, let me know.
zh: 如果有什么我能为你做的，请告诉我。

en: Don't fall asleep. If you fall asleep, you'll die.
zh: 别睡着了。如果你睡着了，你会死的。

en: Don't go to sleep. If you do, you'll die.
zh: 别睡觉。如果你睡着了，你会死的。

en: Name three types of bread.
There's a stain on your T-shirt.
I listen to the radio every day.
I'm Canadian, but I live in Australia.
zh: 我是加拿大人，但我住在澳大利亚。

en: Why is it so dark?
I can't find my key, but it has to be somewhere around here.
zh: 我找不到我的钥匙，但它肯定就在这附近。

en: Will you be drinking tea or coffee?
I'm doing this for our kids' future.
zh: 我这样做是为了我们孩子的未来。

en: It hurts, doesn't it?
Are you coming this weekend?
That's a famous tune.
That's a famous song.
That's a well-known piece of music.
zh: 那是一首广为人知的乐曲。

en: I wonder how many they need.
zh: 我想知道他们需要多少。

en: I hope it keeps raining.
My watch stopped, so I didn't know what time it was.
zh: 我的手表停了，所以我不知道几点了。

en: Keep the windows closed.
How long will be you be staying in Australia?
zh: 你会在澳大利亚待多久？

en: Please sing with me.
I'm going to go lock the door.
The door closed with a clank.
The door closed with a clunk.
Is it OK to eat moldy bread?
"What should I do with this moldy bread?" "If it's moldy, throw it in the trash."
zh: “这发霉的面包该怎么办？” “如果发霉了，就扔到垃圾桶里。”

en: I don't want to talk about that anymore.
That's a bread knife. To cut cheese, this knife is better.
zh: 那是面包刀。要切奶酪，这把刀更好。

en: We had a lovely time.
zh: 我们度过了一段美好的时光。

en: We have a thirty-minute lunch break.
zh: 我们有三十分钟的午休时间。

en: I'll email you.
I'll send you an email.
I'll mail you the books.
I'll mail you the book.
I want to see the sixth Harry Potter film.
zh: 我想看哈利波特第六部电影。

en: "Are you Russian?" "No, I'm Slovakian."
zh: “你是俄罗斯人吗？” “不，我是斯洛伐克人。”

en: There's a lot, but it's still not enough.
It's a lot, but it's not enough.
It's a lot, but it's still not enough.
I'll call you after dinner.
I'll call you after I've finished eating dinner.
zh: 我吃完晚饭后给你打电话。

en: Tom smoothly opened the door.
I spread cheese on the bread.
When I became aware of my surroundings, I was living with my father and grandmother.
zh: 当我意识到周围的环境时，我和我的父亲和祖母住在一起。

en: I don't know anything about my mother. Before I was old enough to remember, she left our home.
zh: 我对我母亲一无所知。在我懂事之前，她就离开了我们的家。

en: No way! That's definitely a lie！
I hear there are a lot of foxes around here, but I seldom see any.
zh: 我听说这附近有很多狐狸，但我很少见到。

en: I hear there are many foxes in this area, but I rarely see any.
zh: 我听说这附近有很多狐狸，但我很少见到。

en: I thought that Tom was living here.
Could I please have a subway map?
zh: 请问能给我一张地铁线路图吗？

en: I'd like a subway map, please.
zh: 请给我一张地铁线路图。

en: "I'm leaving." "Have a good day."
My friends are waiting in front of the library.
zh: 我的朋友们在图书馆前面等我。

en: This car gets bad gas mileage.
Today, I just want to stay home and do nothing.
zh: 今天，我就想待在家里什么都不做。

en: Today, I just want to stay home and relax.
zh: 今天，我就想待在家里放松一下。

en: At school, students learn the three R's.
zh: 在学校里，学生们学习读写算。

en: I want to go to the pool.
This is a song that's popular right now.
zh: 这是一首现在很流行的歌。

en: My dentist recommend that I chew sugarless gum.
zh: 我的牙医建议我嚼无糖口香糖。

en: My dentist recommended that I chew sugar-free gum.
zh: 我的牙医建议我嚼无糖口香糖。

en: I was laughed at at school today.
zh: 我今天在学校被嘲笑了。

en: Oh, no! We're running out of petrol.
zh: 糟糕！我们的汽油快用完了。

en: Don't eat my potato chips.
Find the solution to the following equation.
I've got to get the 8.15 train to Paris.
zh: 我得赶8点15分的火车去巴黎。

en: I need to catch the 8.15 train to Paris.
zh: 我需要赶8点15分的火车去巴黎。

en: My glasses are dirty.
